title: E-Learning System Development and Management Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Strengthening Competencies in Planning and Operating E-Learning Systems in Smartphone-Based Limited Technical Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the e-learning content production process using an LMS in three or more distinct stages.
Learners can present five core elements to consider when designing a mobile-optimized e-learning system.
Through project-based assessment, small teams can draft an e-learning operation manual.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
